speaker: Doctor
text: Hi, I understand you're new to the area. Can you tell me a bit about any medications you're currently taking?

speaker: Patient
text: Hi, yes, I just moved here. I think I'm on a blood pressure pill, but I can't remember the name.

speaker: Doctor
text: That's okay. Do you have the pill bottle with you, or is there a pharmacy you used before moving here that we could contact?

speaker: Patient
text: I don't have the bottle, but I used to get my prescriptions from a pharmacy back in my old town. I can try to find their contact information.

speaker: Doctor
text: That would be helpful. In the meantime, have you experienced any side effects or issues with the medication you remember taking?

speaker: Patient
text: Not that I can recall, but sometimes I forget to take it, especially with the move and all.
